name: EcoChallenge
0:
”Alexa open eco challenge”
”Alexa tell eco challenge to tell my mission”
”Alexa tell eco challenge I complete my mission”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eco challenge
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Users are given missions encouraging them to make subtle changes in their daily routines, each mission has a positive impact on the planet. Complete missions to rank up and become an Eco Warrior!

Eco Challenge can assign you missions like:

Pick up three pieces of rubbish today.
Do not use disposable cup.
Print all documents two-sided today.

As you complete missions, Eco Challenge gives you points. Gain enough points and you level up! You can follow your levels on your Alexa app via cards.

If you permit Eco Challenge to use your email address, the skill also sends you an email contains your badge to share on Facebook!

Each morning simply say “Alexa, Open Echo Challenge” and ask alexa “What’s my mission” you will be randomly assigned a mission. At the end of the day say “Alexa, open eco challenge” Alexa will ask you if you completed your mission, you can either respond with “yes” or “no”. Alexa will award you points if you completed your mission.
